mapper.insert: INSERT INTO service_application(org_id, app_code, app_name, app_type, remark, isvalid, ctime, creater, mtime, updater) VALUES (#{orgId}, #{appCode}, #{appName}, #{appType}, #{remark}, 1, now(), #{creater}, now(), #{updater})
mapper.update: UPDATE service_application SET mtime = now(), updater = #{updater}, org_id = #{orgId}, app_code = #{appCode}, app_name = #{appName}, app_type = #{appType} WHERE isvalid = 1 AND id = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE service_application SET mtime = now(), updater = #{updater}, isvalid = 0 WHERE isvalid = 1 AND id = #{id}
